testcase.classname: Verifying Add place API using pojo classes
testcase.name: User is adding new place using add place API
testcase.system-out: Given user has the basic details for entering a place and using request spec builder.passed When user clicks on the post request and use response spec builder..........passed Then place should get added and status should be "200"......................passed When user clicks on get details using request spec builder and response spec builder.passed Then details should ge fetched successfully and status code should be "200".passed
